title: Reincarnated With the Book of Knowledge - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Supernatural
tags: Calm Protagonist   Fanfiction   Female Master   Male Protagonist   Sword Wielder   Transmigration   Underestimated Protagonist   Unique Cultivation Technique   Weak to Strong
author: Dong Xuanchen   东玄辰
description:
Suddenly finding himself in One Piece's world, Rhodes found himself with an ancient Book in his subconscious, the Book of Knowledge.

With powers obtained from the Book of Knowledge will Rhodes be able to take control of his fate and conquer the world of pirates, or will he succumb under the tyranny of the world government.>
